title: Connection bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I got into a game, and instead of booting the usual way into a game it  gives me the option to reconnect. I click reconnect it says "Game is still in progress" for like .1 seconds and then gives me the reconnect button again. My internet is fine, I have closed and reopened the client, I have clicked it once then sat there for 3 minutes and nothing happened, I have tried running as admin, etc.

replies.body: Your connection specifically to the game server seems to be struggling and failing to get back in, regardless of your internet being okay elsewhere.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, but make sure to do it in a custom game so you don't get any penalties.

I figured out the issue after repairing and trying to join a custom game, it was a problem with DirectX because I had switched video cards. Thanks for the reply though.

- gate
